* **Perfect Compatibility:** Designed specifically for Surron Sur-Ron Sur Ron Lightbee X S Segway X160 X260 models, ensuring a seamless fit and optimal performance. 
* **Lightweight Design:** The lightweight construction of this sprocket reduces unsprung weight, improving your bike's handling and overall agility.
